# INFocusStatusAuthorizationStatus.denied

**Case**

The user has denied your app access to their focus status.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Constants

- **INFocusStatusAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined**: The user hasn’t chosen whether to grant your app access to their focus status yet.
- **INFocusStatusAuthorizationStatus.restricted**: A restriction prevents your app from accessing the user’s focus status.
- **INFocusStatusAuthorizationStatus.authorized**: Your app has authorization to access the user’s focus status.
